{"id":927040681,"lang":"java","lang_name":"Java","time":"1Â month","timestamp":1680503757,"status":10,"status_display":"Accepted","runtime":"1 ms","url":"/submissions/detail/927040681/","is_pending":"Not Pending","title":"Monotone Increasing Digits","memory":"39.8 MB","code":"class Solution {\n    public int monotoneIncreasingDigits(int n) {\n        char[] arr = String.valueOf(n).toCharArray();\n        int start = arr.length;\n        for (int i = arr.length - 2; i >= 0; i --) {\n            if (arr[i] > arr[i + 1]) {\n                start = i + 1;\n                arr[i] --;\n            }\n        }\n        \n        for (int i = start; i < arr.length; i ++) {\n            arr[i] = '9';\n        }\n        \n        return Integer.parseInt(String.valueOf(arr));\n    }\n}","compare_result":"","title_slug":"monotone-increasing-digits","has_notes":false}
